channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the 49ers' Win Over the Eagles
item.description: The bruised-and-battered 49ers went on the road and knocked off the defending champions. Here are our takeaways.

item.title: Tom Brady's LFG Player of the Game: 49ers WR Demarcus Robinson üèÜ Wild Card Round
item.description: Tom Brady awards San Francisco 49ers WR Demarcus Robinson with the LFG Player of the Game after his big performance against the Philadelphia Eagles in...

item.description: The "NFL on FOX" crew broke down the San Francisco 49ers' 23-19 win over he Philadelphia Eagles in the Wild Card Round.

item.title: 49ers Star TE George Kittle Tore Achilles in Upset Win vs. Eagles
item.description: George Kittle was carted off late in the first half of Sunday's game against the Eagles.

item.title: A.J. Brown, Nick Sirianni Have Heated Moment in Eagles' Loss to 49ers
item.description: A.J. Brown and Nick Sirianni needed to be separated on the sideline after sharing a heated exchange.

item.title: Josh Allen, Bills outlast Jaguars to advance to AFC divisional round
item.description: The Bills won 27-24 after intercepting a Trevor Lawrence pass in the last minute of the game.

item.title: Niners defeat defending champs for NFC wild-card win
item.description: The victory sends the 49ers to Seattle for the NFC divisional round next weekend.

item.title: Follow live: Borregales makes 35-yard FG to give Patriots slight edge
Four wild-card games, four overreactions, four big questions: Bills finally to the Super Bowl?
item.description: Is it the Bills' year? Are the 49ers a legit contender? Is Caleb Williams a future MVP?

item.title: The NFC playoff bracket is set: Reasons for optimism for the Seahawks, 49ers, Bears and Rams
item.description: Let's preview the divisional round matchups. How can each team win next weekend and advance? Here's what to know.
